Chief Analytics Officer | NYC Dept of Buildings | Full-time, Onsite | NYC

The NYC Department of Buildings is responsible for ensuring the safe and lawful use of buildings and properties. As Chief Analytics Officer, you will be in charge of performance, operational and predictive data analysis, as well as the agency's GIS and mapping capabilities.

To apply: http://www.bit.ly/dobjob

Additional tech roles in NYC government: http://www.nyc.gov/techjobs

Happy to answer any questions about joining the greatest city in the world! Email me: dseliger@cto.nyc.gov
